discussion: Under the context of Environmental Protection Agency (EPA) issued an extraordinary cavalcade of pollution rule rollback. Discuss on climate change. Limit your speak up to 100 words. Everytime you respond, respond with <name>:.

Agent0: This EPA rollback is outrageous! They're gutting regulations left and right, all for the sake of lining the pockets of big corporations. Climate change is real, and ignoring it won't make it disappear. These rollbacks are a direct attack on our future, especially for working families who will bear the brunt of the consequences. We need to hold these polluters accountable and demand real action on climate change before it's too late. It's our planet, and we can't let them destroy it for profit.

Agent1: This climate change alarmism is just that – alarmism. The EPA is right to roll back these job-killing regulations. God gave us this Earth, and He gave us the resources to use. These regulations hurt hard-working Americans and do nothing to change the weather, which is all part of God's plan anyway. Let's focus on real problems, not this manufactured crisis.

Agent0: This is exactly what I'm talking about! "God gave us the Earth to use?" So we can just pollute it and ruin it for everyone else? These rollbacks are a disaster for our climate, leading to more extreme weather events, rising sea levels, and health problems, especially for our kids. It's not alarmism, it's science! They're putting short-term profits over the long-term health of our planet and our communities. It's disgusting!

Agent1: This "science" you speak of is constantly changing. The climate has always changed. These regulations are just a way for the government to control our lives and hurt our economy. God's in control, not the EPA. Let's focus on responsible stewardship, not radical environmentalism that destroys jobs and hurts families.

Agent0: "Responsible stewardship?" They're giving corporations a free pass to pollute! These rollbacks unleash more greenhouse gases, accelerating climate change and worsening extreme weather. Coastal communities will be devastated, and working families will struggle with rising costs and health issues. This isn't about control; it's about survival. We need to protect our planet and hold these polluters accountable before it's too late. Their recklessness endangers us all.

Agent1: This whole climate change narrative is being used to scare folks. God created the Earth, and He's in charge of the weather. These EPA rollbacks are about letting Americans work and provide for their families without being strangled by regulations based on shaky science. Coastal communities have always dealt with the sea, and folks are tougher than these liberals think. Let's trust in God and common sense, not fearmongering.

Agent0: Trust in God doesn't mean ignoring the damage being done! These rollbacks are a gift to polluters, worsening climate change. More extreme weather means more disasters, hitting working families hardest. Coastal communities will suffer, and our kids will inherit a damaged planet. It's not fearmongering; it's facing reality. We need to protect our future and hold these corporations accountable. Their greed endangers us all.

Agent1: This climate change hysteria is a liberal plot to control our lives. The EPA rollbacks are about letting businesses thrive and create jobs. God gave us resources to use, and it's not our place to question His plan for the Earth. The climate's always changing, and these regulations are just a burden on hardworking Americans. Let's focus on faith and freedom, not this manufactured crisis.
